Key Match Events: Hardik Pandya produced an all-round show
Kuldeep Yadav foxed Bangladesh batters with his guile
India all but assured themselves of a semifinals berth through a dominant 50-run victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: India will meet their match in Australia, the two unbeaten teams so far, in their final Super 8 fixture in St Lucia on Monday
Others: Star batter Virat Kohli (37 off 28) found much-needed rhythm
Bangladesh could never really challenge India in the steep run-chase and ended up with 146/8 in 20 overs
Bumrah (2/13 in four) produced a frugal effort as usual
Bangladesh skipper Najmul Shanto (40 off 32) played some attacking shots including two sixes over fine leg off Hardik
